body:

The SSH of the master node and other machines (slave nodes) has been connected.

> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <https://github.com/analysys/EasyScheduler/issues/708?email_source=notifications&email_token=ALAMZWNBHMQNHGDZQKUZRA3QFJB3DA5CNFSM4IMHXXM2YY3PNVWWK3TUL52HS4DFVREXG43VMVBW63LNMVXHJKTDN5WW2ZLOORPWSZGOD4R5WHI#issuecomment-522443549>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ALAMZWPWFZFVIY6PX4MAKUDQFJB3DANCNFSM4IMHXXMQ>.
>

Some preliminary suggestions:

main problem:
  1. Implement export/import, using export to excel, which leads us to introduce poi-ooxml as a huge dependency (for example, it relies on a lot of xml libraries)
  2. Added hutool-all dependency. This dependent license is the Mulan protocol. This ASF estimates that the protocol is not yet compliant, and it is not very good to rely on hutool-all instead of the specific module itself.



other questions:

1. When exporting, the schedule defined by the process will be exported at the same time, and the schedule will be created when creating. This is not necessarily necessary for export/import. It is better to be configurable.

2. Many resources are open with try-with-resources, such as:

      Public Map<String, Object> importProcessDefinition(User loginUser, MultipartFile file) { In the function, reader = ExcelUtil.getReader(file.getInputStream()); It is possible to not close the resource.

3. When importing, create ProcessDefinition is directly new ProcessDefinition, and directly set the value of each field, it is best to use existing methods, such as: ProcessDefinitionService.createProcessDefinition, instead of directly copying an existing logic to ProcessDefinitionService.importProcessDefinition

4. A lot of code similar to map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != null && map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != "" can be changed to: StringUtils.isNotEmpty

5. Excel is written in xlsx format:
    Writer.write(rows, true);
    response.setHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=test.xlsx");
   The file name read by js is [processDefinitionName].xls :
    Let fileName = `${fileNameS}.xls`

6. When the front end uploads, setTimeout is used. This seems to be unnecessary. I don't know if it will cause the memory leak on the js side (timer etc. can easily cause js memory problems)

          this._formDataUpdate().then(res => {
            setTimeout(() => {
              This.$refs['popup'].spinnerLoading = false
            }, 800)

---

初步的一些建议:

主要问题:
  1. 实现导出/导入, 使用了导出到 excel, 这个导致我们需要引入 poi-ooxml 这个 巨大的依赖(比如其依赖了很多xml库)
  2. 新加了 hutool-all 这个依赖, 这个依赖的license是 木兰协议, 这个ASF 估计还没有研究这个协议是否合规, 而且依赖hutool-all 而不是具体的模块本身也不是很好



其它问题:

1. 导出时, 同时会导出该 流程定义 的 定时 (schedule),  而创建时也会新建 schedule, 这个不一定是导出/导入所必须的, 最好能做成可以配置的? 

2. 很多资源打开最好用 try-with-resources, 比如:

      public Map<String, Object> importProcessDefinition(User loginUser, MultipartFile file) {  函数中,  reader = ExcelUtil.getReader(file.getInputStream());  有可能不关闭资源.

3. 导入时, 创建ProcessDefinition是直接new ProcessDefinition, 并直接设置各个字段值, 最好能用现有方法, 比如: ProcessDefinitionService.createProcessDefinition , 而不是直接copy一份现有逻辑到 ProcessDefinitionService.importProcessDefinition

4. 很多类似于  map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != null && map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != "" 的代码可以改为:  StringUtils.isNotEmpty

5. Excel写的时候是xlsx格式: 
    writer.write(rows, true);
    response.setHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=test.xlsx");
   js端读取的文件命名是   [processDefinitionName].xls :
    let fileName = `${fileNameS}.xls`

6. 前端上传时, 使用了 setTimeout, 这个好像没有必要, 不知道会不会引起js端的memory leak (timer等很容易造成js内存问题) 

          this._formDataUpdate().then(res => {
            setTimeout(() => {
              this.$refs['popup'].spinnerLoading = false
            }, 800)

Oxherd
1. Just as apache has zookeeper, **oxherd** means cattle keeper
2. Since ancient times, cattle have been farming for people, symbolizing workers. The role of this project is also to manage these workers.

2. This tool class should be removed.
other questions:
1. Make configuration no problem
2. Can

6. I wrote it with reference to the resource uploading code. My front end is not very familiar. If there is risk, I can remove it.

---

主要问题：
1.逻辑我已经写出来了，但是像引入poi-ooxml 依赖这些好像是必需要的，可否给一些解决方案？
2.这个工具类应该可以去掉的。
其它问题：
1.做成配置没问题
2.可以

6.我是参考资源上传的代码写的，我前端也不算很熟，有风险的话可以去掉




------------------ 原始邮件 ------------------
发件人: "Baoqi"<notifications@github.com>;
发送时间: 2019年8月19日(星期一) 下午3:31
收件人: "analysys/EasyScheduler"<EasyScheduler@noreply.github.com>;
抄送: "虫子"<389401879@qq.com>;"Author"<author@noreply.github.com>;
主题: Re: [analysys/EasyScheduler] 增加工作流导出导入功能，前端定时器表达式的秒和分钟的默认值从*修改成0 (#709)




初步的一些建议:
 
主要问题:
  
实现导出/导入, 使用了导出到 excel, 这个导致我们需要引入 poi-ooxml 这个 巨大的依赖(比如其依赖了很多xml库)
 
新加了 hutool-all 这个依赖, 这个依赖的license是 木兰协议, 这个ASF 估计还没有研究这个协议是否合规, 而且依赖hutool-all 而不是具体的模块本身也不是很好
  
其它问题:
  
 
导出时, 同时会导出该 流程定义 的 定时 (schedule),  而创建时也会新建 schedule, 这个不一定是导出/导入所必须的, 最好能做成可以配置的?
 
 
 
很多资源打开最好用 try-with-resources, 比如:
 
public Map<String, Object> importProcessDefinition(User loginUser, MultipartFile file) {  函数中,  reader = ExcelUtil.getReader(file.getInputStream());  有可能不关闭资源.
 
 
 
导入时, 创建ProcessDefinition是直接new ProcessDefinition, 并直接设置各个字段值, 最好能用现有方法, 比如: ProcessDefinitionService.createProcessDefinition , 而不是直接copy一份现有逻辑到 ProcessDefinitionService.importProcessDefinition
 
 
 
很多类似于  map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != null && map.get("scheduleReleaseState") != "" 的代码可以改为:  StringUtils.isNotEmpty
 
 
 
Excel写的时候是xlsx格式:
 writer.write(rows, true);
 response.setHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=test.xlsx");
 js端读取的文件命名是   [processDefinitionName].xls :
 let fileName = ${fileNameS}.xls
 
 
 
前端上传时, 使用了 setTimeout, 这个好像没有必要, 不知道会不会引起js端的memory leak (timer等很容易造成js内存问题)
    this._formDataUpdate().then(res => {      setTimeout(() => {        this.$refs['popup'].spinnerLoading = false      }, 800)  
  
—

在任务队列中，如果第一个任务在流程组中定义了实现任务的流程组，但又在流程组中找不到执行任务的主机，此时所有任务都会被第一个任务阻塞在队列中。

Python3 is no problem, you can call it separately to see if the environment variable is not configured correctly. Some brothers have encountered this problem before.

1, the log error has been resolved in 1.1.0, but it is filtered on the server side of gRPC
Not filtered from the thread that intercepts the log from the logback, that is, the bottom of the logback
The log intercepted by Linux is still garbled
2, you can verify by the following steps
1) Find the log all in the path
For example, the log is stored in /data1/escheduler/logs/65/5012/85119.log
2) LoggerServer gRPC IP and port access
LogClient logClient = new LogClient(host, Constants.RPC_PORT);
String log = logClient.rollViewLog(taskInstance.getLogPath(),skipLineNum,limit);

Note: Make sure it is version 1.1.0

1，日志错误在1.1.0中已经解决了，不过是在gRPC的服务端过滤的
不是从logback 拦截日志的线程中过滤的，也就是说，logback底层
Linux 拦截的日志还是错乱的
2，可以通过以下步骤进行验证
1) 找到日志所有在路径
比如说，日志存放在 /data1/escheduler/logs/65/5012/85119.log
2) LoggerServer gRPC IP 和 端口 进行访问
LogClient logClient = new LogClient(host, Constants.RPC_PORT);
String log = logClient.rollViewLog(taskInstance.getLogPath(),skipLineNum,limit);

注意：确保是1.1.0版本
